## ProgressWindow.removeItem() method

Remove an item from the window

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeItem(id: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | the id of the item to remove |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

- resolves when the item has been removed
